entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:51 AM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:51 AM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
